Dictionary API

Made by Parkourer10

Examples


    


    

      
Endpoint: https://dictionary.fonders.org/dictionary/{word}

      
This endpoint returns a JSON response with definitions and examples for the word you provide.

      
Code Example

      

        
        
      

      

        
import requests

#make a req to the api
response = requests.get("https://dictionary.fonders.org/dictionary/hello")

#check if 200 else display error code
if response.status_code == 200:
    data = response.json()
    print(data)
else:
    print(f"Error: {response.status_code}")

      

      

        I got bored, so I made this dictionary API.

        Use it in all your apps with no strings attached. No keys, no nonsense. 

        Right now, it only supports English words, but I plan to add more languages in the future.
